response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you is even greater. I am offering this extraordinary piece to you at a special price of $950,000.

This offer is tailored to ensure you have the chance to secure a remarkable investment at a premium yet reasonable cost. I believe it presents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit from this unique transaction.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
